document_data.name: Thorndar Erlin
document_data.mainbody: '''Thorndar Erlin''' was the High Priest of [[Lathander]], the Morninglord, and the author of the ''[[Teachings of the Morning's Glory]]'', penned in the first century [[DR]].
document_data.History:
Thorndar Erlin was renowned as the author of the ''Teachings of the Morning's Glory'', the holy text of the [[Church of Lathander]], published in the {{YearlinkName|20}}. In the [[book]], High Priest Erlin talked about the importance of family for the Morninglord's faithful, improving the family's well-being from one generation to the next. In the same manner, the ''Teachings'' stated that the leader of a realm is responsible for improving the lives of its inhabitants with each passing generation.

By the late-14{{th}} century DR, Thorndar Erlin's work was preserved in the library stronghold of [[Candlekeep]].{{Cite web enhancement/The Leaves of Learning|5}}
